Class RotationEvent

  • java.lang.Object

      • ohos.multimodalinput.event.RotationEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public abstract class RotationEvent
extends MultimodalEvent
    Defines events generated by rotation components, for example, a digital watch crown on a smart watch.

    • Method Detail

      • getRotationValue

        public abstract float getRotationValue​()
        Obtains the rotation value generated by the rotation component.

        The value definition may vary depending on the component. For example, this value of some components may indicate the angle of rotation, whereas that of other components may indicate the number of circles that have been rotated.

        Returns:
        Returns the generated rotation value.
        Since:
        3
